__e: Look, at some point, people have to tell their kids that Santa Claus isn't real.
I guess that's why Santa never had any kids. That we know of.
Man, why do I gotta be the guy that tells the kids there's no Santa Claus?
I am actually Santa, and I think it would be best--
- Be glad to. Would you please tell her that you're not really Santa Claus... that there actually is no such person?
Why don't you just tell her about Santa Claus or the pope while you're at it.
Why don't you just tell her about Santa Claus or the pope while you're at it.
Oh, and also she said that they're not from her, - they're from Santa Claus.
U-um...w-well, actually, my--my husband confirmed that he's the real Santa Claus.
It's Santa. He's not jolly anymore.
And later on, that girl was glad... that Santy didn't give her what she'd asked him for.
Your father didn't tell you there it was?
He's not the Hogfather we usually have!
If the real Hogfather doesn't turn up soon, there's not going to be enough room for him.
And in a way, the Hogfather was all of 'em.
